title: DC presides over PWD’s  meeting
content:
NOWSHERA VIRKAN, Jan 24 (APP):Under the vision of the Chief Minister, Punjab, Deputy Commissioner, Gujranwala, Naveed Ahmed on Friday chaired a meeting of Population Welfare Department (PWD) regarding population management in the district.
The issues regarding uncontrolled population growth, decreasing resources to meet the population’s requirements, substandard foods, quality of  education and Health facilities  for the people and living standard  of the people in the district were discussed in the meeting.
The deputy commissioner also reviewed the measures for controlling the population, and health of newborns and mothers and improving education standards in the district.
The Dc directed the department to launch effective campaigns to aware the people regarding benefits of birth control.
